story: As a Developer, I want to integrate with third-party payment APIs, so that I can enable secure transaction processing across multiple payment providers
As a Product Manager, I want to analyze user behavior patterns, so that I can optimize the recommendation engine and improve conversion rates
As a System Administrator, I want to monitor application performance, so that I can set up alerting and implement auto-scaling solutions
As a Mobile User, I want to sync data across devices, so that I can maintain consistency while handling offline scenarios and conflict resolution
As a Customer Support Agent, I want to access customer information, so that I can resolve issues and update the knowledge base system
